name: Steamed Mixed Vegetables
description: Extra virgin olive oil is a staple of the Mediterranean diet. Add it to mixed vegetables for bright, bold flavour!
preparation: Peel and chop carrots and onion into equal-sized pieces. Coarsely dice peppers.
Place carrots, onion, peppers, broccoli, oil, and seasoning in Round or Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and, holding lid tightly, shake the contents of the steamer to evenly combine.
Microwave for 10â€”12 min or until vegetables are tender.
tips: Substitute Holiday Seasoning during the holidays for a festive herb blend.
